comments.author: Matt
comments.body: I will be there! I will likely leave about 10 minutes early as not to hold back the main pack of riders; it worked very well last time.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm in! Looks like it might get toasty today... might be the first swimmin'hole day of the season, eh? D

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: toasty indeed! should be a nice ride, tho'. i have to be back chez moi at 115h, so i may not be able to be 'super' today. ;) -steve
